title: Brookfield Renewable Partners ( TSE : BEP . UN ) Announces Quarterly Earnings Results
description: Read Brookfield Renewable Partners (TSE:BEP.UN) Announces Quarterly Earnings Results at Markets Daily, Brookfield Renewable Partners (TSE:BEP.UN – Get Free Report) (NYSE:BEP) posted its quarterly earnings results on Friday. The company reported C$0.74 earnings per share for the quarter, FiscalAI reports. The company had revenue of C$2.11 billion during the quarter. Brookfield Renewable Partners had a positive return on equity of 0.46% and a negative net margin of […]
